summary.name: Global Media Industries Visual Effects (VFX) Supply Chain
summary.description:
The work of creating digital visual effects in film and entertainment is a laborious post-production process that is highly taylorized and outsourced all over the world. This map is an attempt to map the global pipelines of VFX in Europe, Americas and Asia.
Suryansu Guha, "Global Media Industries Visual Effects (VFX) Supply Chain," Manifest: Supply Chain Platform (2024)

overview.name: DNEG - UK
overview.description: DNEG, formerly known as Double Negative started as a boutique studio in the UK but in 2016 was acquired by an Indian multi national conglomerate by the name of Prime Focus. This is the London studio of DNEG.

overview.description: DNEG's studio or offshore development center at Mohali

overview.description: DNEG's studio or offshore development center in Chennai, Tamil Nadu

overview.name: DNEG - Los Angeles
overview.description: DNEG's office in Los Angeles. The work that takes place here is very limited and mostly client facing. It is mostly a storefront to maintain their presence in the film capital of the world.
